definitions.definition: (the total amount collected of) a plant such as a grain, fruit, or vegetable grown in large amounts:
examples: The main crops grown for export are coffee and rice.

definitions.definition: to make something shorter or smaller, especially by cutting:
examples: He had his hair cropped when he went into the army.

definitions.definition: When animals such as sheep or horses crop grass or other plants, they eat the top parts.
to remove some or all of the edges from a picture, leaving only the most important part:
examples: He cropped the photo so that only the face remained.
